rooms.description: An inviting entrance hall with Art Deco inspired decorative elements. Incorporates Vastu principles by orienting the entrance to face the north or east.

A spacious living area with ample natural light. Walls and fixtures reflect the bold geometric patterns of Art Deco. Doors and windows are oriented according to Vastu guidelines to promote energy flow.
Adjacent to the living room, this dining area features a central dining table with decorative Art Deco elements. The design ensures proper east-facing openings for positive energy.
A modern, efficient kitchen designed with stainless steel accents and geometric patterns typical of Art Deco, ensuring optimal ventilation and adherence to Vastu principles.
The master bathroom is elegantly designed with Art Deco fixtures. It includes a walk-in shower and is located in the northeast quadrant as per Vastu norms.
Master bedroom featuring a king-sized bed, built-in wardrobe, and an attached bathroom. The layout ensures a peaceful environment with emphasis on north-east orientation for prosperity.
Second bedroom designed for children or guests. Layout and orientation respect Vastu principles ensuring harmonious energy flow.
Additional bedroom providing privacy, with ample storage space. Positioned considering optimal air circulation.

A dedicated library area featuring built-in bookshelves and comfortable seating. Designed with Art Deco motifs and a calm ambience, placed in the central section of the ground floor for easy access from all areas.

openings.description: A large front door positioned on the north or east side to invite positive energy as per Vastu principles and Art Deco detailing.
Alcove windows placed strategically around the living room and dining area to ensure balanced natural light in accordance with Vastu guidelines.
A central courtyard opening that connects all rooms, allowing for ample ventilation and providing a communal outdoor space. The layout of openings ensures that the courtyard remains the focal point.
